title: By The River
lyrics:
We had such a hell of a time
On the banks of the river a drinking too much wine
Oh yeah, oh yeah
We sat by the water smoking cigarettes
And you told me those words that I can't forget

Oh yeah, oh yeah



When we were together

Those were the days that couldn't get much better

I feel the same, you feel the same

I told ya

I'll be waiting for you



So meet me by the river

Where it all begun

Let's go back to the place where our love burned brighter than sun

Oh yeah



Meet me by the river

Where it all begun

Let's go back to the place where our love burned brighter than sun

Oh yeah



By the river

Meet me by the river

By the river

Oh yeah



Oh I see it rising, that sweet old moon

Are you thinking of me cause I'm thinking of you

Oh yeah, oh oh yeah



Been thinking bout those eyes of the deepest green

I don't know my mind but I know what I have seen

Oh yeah



When we were together

Those were the days that couldn't get much better

I do believe, I do believe

I told ya

I'll be waiting for you



So meet me by the river

Where it all begun

Let's go back to the place where our love burned brighter than sun

Oh yeah



Meet me by the river

Where it all begun

Let's go back to the place where our love burned brighter than sun

Oh yeah



By the river

Meet me by the river

By the river

Oh yeah



Meet me by the river

Where it all begun

Let's go back to the place where our love burned brighter than sun

Oh yeah
